class.name: LuaObject
class.brief_description: The base classes of many Lua objects.
class.description: The LuaObject class provides methods to access the associated Lua state.

method.name: get_lua_state
method.description: Returns the LuaState that owns this Lua object. [codeblocks] [gdscript] var lua = LuaState.new() lua.globals["say"] = lua.create_function(func(): print("hello!") ) var coroutine := LuaCoroutine.create(lua.globals["say"]) assert(lc.get_lua_state() == lua) [/gdscript] [/codeblocks]

method.name: get_pointer_value
method.description: Returns the pointer value of the Lua object as an integer.
